org.androidtown.sleeper.propclasses.dataprocessor_manager

Class clDataProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.androidtown.sleeper.propclasses.dataprocessor_manager.clDataProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    clComManager.IMessageListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    clAccelTempDataProcessor

    public abstract class clDataProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements clComManager.IMessageListener
    Abstract processor that classifies sleep stage. User can implement this class to make their sleep controlling equation and device controlling using sleep stage output from stage classifier.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  clDataProcessor.clDatabaseManager
      Database manager that wraps up SQLite db helper.
      static class  clDataProcessor.clSleepStageClassifier
      Classifies sleep stage using accelerometer sensor it uses libsvm-androidjni, JTransform library
